unknown: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. The error has been logged and an administrator has been notified. Please try again in a short while if you wish.-fr
internal: Sorry, an internal server error occurred. The error has been logged and an administrator has been notified. Please try again in a short while if you wish.-fr
invalid_login: Either the username or password for your login did not match an account in this instance.-fr
empty_username: A username is required to login-fr
empty_password: A password must be given to login-fr
empty_reason: A reason must be specified to report a post-fr
